text_block_list.text: One day, I head to the training course…

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: We'll be resuming our cover story right after the break.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Thanks! I'm counting on you!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: *sigh* If you keep staring at me like that, I'll get tired.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …Right, Scarlet?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …Oh, dear. You're in a good mood. You look like you're about to lose your cool.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: If we were rivals like this, we wouldn't have had to wait and see. We'd have won the next race.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: *sigh* You never change.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Hmph… I'll give you one piece of advice. Don't regret saying something so bad, okay?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: An interview is a record. It's very different from shouting at the riverbank.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Haha, stupid.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: It's because it's on record that you say cool things. Just follow my heart.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …I feel like a fool.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: Vodka, please stand by.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Oh! I'm coming!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …Heheh, just you wait.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: Now, before I take a picture of her running…

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: Vodka. You're the most expected of this term, and you're still active…

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: Can you say something?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Of course! I've decided what to say.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …I'll win any race! And I'll redo the highest GI record!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I think I'll do everything I can to get the most excited, so watch!

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: …Do you intend to surpass even Chairman Rudolf's record?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Of course. But if you want to doubt my resolve…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Tell me when you see me running.
And vodka starts running――

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Wow…! Wow, that's amazing…!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: You're right! I'm looking forward to the race!

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: …What a wonderful girl. If it's her, then her words from before will be realized in the future…!

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: Heehee… I'm so glad I got permission to cover the next issue! I'll get in touch with the editor-in-chief and do a special feature on the next month!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …Hmph.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …You seem to be doing well. I'll definitely win the next race!
